trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St Albans
There were no other sightings in St Albans on or around June 8th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my kicthen roof having a smoke (no smoking house,and I like to sit up there and watch the planes go by),when I noticed these 2 lights,as you can see in the video.They were far too close together to be planes,and making no noise so they weren't helicopters. I see planes and things every night,I know what they look like. Anyway,the one on the right fades away first,but what the camera doesn't pick up,is that it fades to an orange,and moves off to the right. The other one stays for about a minute,fades to orange and then sort of goes up a little bit before vanashing. I do live near an airport,but these were like no planes i've seen before,firstly,the lights were massive compared to an aircraft light. Like huge stars. Anyway,enjoy!!
Summary: 2 orbs of light,1 goes orange and moves to the left,the other dissapears.
